data.message: #Eminem has long pointed out how shitty our #government is and how corrupt it has become. Much of which has been shadowed by his outrageous wit. At the same time he has always stood for America. You have the ability to #resist corruption, and at the same time love your country. This is where most righty’s get confused, and their little brains begin to hurt. #Kaepernick and his peers sit down because the government has failed to recognize a multitude of issues. It has NOTHING to do with his love of his #country. Failing to see this makes you a simpleton. But anyway, grateful for Eminem using his platform to point out the hypocrisy and bullshit that is happening in the #WhiteHouse. I can’t wait for his new album to drop in hopes there is more of this. #fuckTrump #fuckthegovernment  #USA #fuckthesimpletons

replies.message: Joel Taylor nice meme bud. Do you got any actual thoughts on the subject of your own that you would like to add? Or do you rely solely on google, memes, and Fox News to do your thinking for you?

Thank you for demonstrating the difference between a Trump supporter, and people with actual thoughts. You can now go back to worshipping pretend men in the sky, eating fast food, and reality television.
Another chimpanzee incapable of coming up with anything on his own. Relying solely on social media and memes to do the thinking and talking for them. Sheep for the slaughter.
Aye numb nut, this is what Trump is doing. Cleaning the swamp of a government we have. Pay attention to the changes he is making.
David Brunt no, he and his cronies are the swamp, and you are as intelligent as pond scum.
Your a gutless bitch motherfucker coward

Billy Claggett it’s actually *you’re, but thought provoking message bud. You are the witless, zombified problem with the human race. Incapable of rational thought, and deep thinking. Only capable of gaining wisdom through television, and propaganda. Go back to your reality television, and leave the tough stuff for those of us with the capability of using our minds.
Lol typical liberal emo tard...wants to voice his opinion but insults anyone else who doesn't share your point of view...
Brian, you called him a "liberal emo tard" for no reason other than him having a different opinion than yours.
Looks like these haters need to listen to "White America".

Kevin Engle it’s cool bud. Ever notice how these goons use the same sound bites they hear on television, you go to ANY post and you will see the exact same language repeated over and OVER. Libtard, Donald’s draining the swamp, etc... They are simple minded, little followers who require television and memes in order to develop an opinion. That’s as far as they take it. They don’t have any actual real thoughts of their own. It’s expected when you look at Trumps base, they are brainless sheep just falling in line with the oh so great leader. It’s sad our society has literally become this stupid, but you can be thankful you aren’t one of these mindless morons going through life on auto pilot.

Burn, you got sure set me straight! Just glancing at your profile for all of 5 seconds you can see exactly how mindless you actually are. Looks like you spend about 8hrs of each day just playing games on your phone! Dude, pick up a fucking book, get outside, and get a life. Or go back to numbing your brain with your childish phone games. Sorry ass excuse for a human.

Exactly. The people that like Eminem that look at trump like he is the second coming, or like how you said are the one's Eminem told fuck you too. I doubt he seriously meant "fuck you" to his fans that voted for trump simply because they saw him as the lesser of two evils. It is clear from that freestyle that he was targeting trumps drones.
sorry man that was meant for someone else.
No worries, I don’t understand the new fb system either, kinda throws comments and replys wherever it wants it seems?
